tool_description: Calculates and analyzes performance metrics for order routing and warehouse assignment decisions to support continuous improvement.

metric_types.description: Types of metrics to calculate: cost_efficiency, delivery_speed, inventory_turnover, capacity_utilization

order_types.description: Order types to include: standard, express, bulk

error_messages: Invalid metric type: Must be one of: cost_efficiency, delivery_speed, inventory_turnover, capacity_utilization.
Invalid warehouse ID: One or more warehouse identifiers are not recognized.
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date, both in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid order type: Must be one of: standard, express, bulk.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data available for the specified period and warehouses.
usage: Provide metric_types, warehouse_ids, date_range_start, and date_range_end for performance analysis. Optionally specify order_types to filter analysis scope.

performance_summary.description: Overall performance assessment across requested metrics
